tool_description: The API will locate and verify current and previous addresses, phone numbers, aliases, SSN. DOB and other identifying information about an individual from public records, credit bureau data, compiled and listed telephone databases and other sources.
title: Enhanced People Search

api_list.name: /GetReport
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://enhanced-people-search.p.rapidapi.com/GetReport"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "enhanced-people-search.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://enhanced-people-search.p.rapidapi.com/GetReport"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "enhanced-people-search.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
